turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can i be of your assistance

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to order three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 pizzas sure, where from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bella Luna, ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size will your pizza be?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: small, got it, what are your choice of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first pizza, I would like pepperoni and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with pepperoni and mushroom, ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second pizza, I would like a meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with meat lovers ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And the third pizza, I want chicken, black olives, and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 with chicken with black olives and mushrooms, got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like a thick crust for all of the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thick crust, sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: give me one moment to repeat all that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so we have 3 small pizzas, 1 with pepperoni and mushroom, 1 with meat lovers, 1 with chicken with black olives and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all with thick crust, is that your final order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok let me calculate your total for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: with 3 small pizza your total comes to 35 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: shall we order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, your pizza are on order at the local Bella Luna pizzeria and will be ready for pickup in 30 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you are welcome, enjoy your pizza.

items.name: chicken with black olives and mushrooms
